name: Unreal 3D Racing: Miami Heat Highway Pursuit - Pro
name_original: Unreal 3D Racing: Miami Heat Highway Pursuit - Pro
description:
Get hooked on Unreal 3D Racing!
Retro graphics combined with a 3D driving experience.
Get behind the wheel of these luxury cars and feel the excitement now!


Game Features:
* Race your way through 5 checkpoints

* Share your high scores with friends through Facebook

* Choose from 6 luxury vehicles to race with

* 3 great audio tracks to choose

* Option for PVP or multiplayer to race against other people!

* Immersive 3D graphics for an authentic racing experience

* Unique and smooth gameplay

* Game center integration to compare your scores


Combine the realistic racing of csr with the retro pixelated flare in this top nitro racing challenge. Feel the furious heat and speed through the tracks like a nascar driver.

Extreme 3D racing through cities, mountains, desserts, freeways and hillsides. See how long you can last. Climb hills and beat your rivals in this furious car racing classic.

Free to race with McLaren, Mercedes or Audi. Upgrade for $.99 to drive a custom Lamborghini, Bugatti Veyron or Camaro.
